scripts.production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production    knex migrate:latest && cross-env NODE_ENV=production    node src/server.js
scripts.staging: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging knex migrate:latest && cross-env NODE_ENV=staging node src/server.js
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev     knex migrate:latest && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev     nodemon src/server.js
